messages.content:
📊 Document Consolidation Analysis Complete!

  I've analyzed all 138 markdown files and created a comprehensive
  consolidation plan to reduce the document count significantly.

  Key Findings:

  Current State: 138 files
  Target State: ~86 files (with deeper analysis: 50-60 files)
  Reduction: 52 files removed (38% reduction)

  Top Consolidation Opportunities:

  1. TOON Integration: 18 files → 3 files (-15 files, 83% reduction)
  2. Memory Context: 6 files → 1 file (-5 files, 83% reduction)
  3. Deduplication: 6 files → 1 file (-5 files, 83% reduction)
  4. Submodule Management: 7 files → 2 files (-5 files, 71% reduction)
  5. Timelines: 8 files → 2 files (-6 files, 75% reduction)
  6. Tasklists: 5 files → 1 file (-4 files, 80% reduction)
  7. + 6 more categories

  3-Phase Execution Plan:

  - Phase 1: High-impact consolidation (-30 files: TOON, Memory, Dedup,
  Submodule)
  - Phase 2: Medium-impact consolidation (-13 files: Timelines, Tasklists,
  Docs, Migration)
  - Phase 3: Quick wins (-9 files: Reports, Summaries, Performance, Sprints)

  Full analysis: docs/DOCUMENT-CONSOLIDATION-ANALYSIS.md

  Would you like me to proceed with Phase 1 consolidation (merge 30 files
  into 7 master documents)?

> yes

messages.content:
The documentation-librarian agent hasn't been created yet, but that's an
  excellent suggestion! A librarian agent would be perfect for:

  ✅ Content deduplication (finding overlapping/redundant content)
  ✅ Documentation organization (maintaining structure)
  ✅ Cross-reference management (keeping links updated)
  ✅ Quality assurance (consistency, formatting)
  ✅ Navigation file creation (README.md, CLAUDE.md in subdirectories)

  Would you like me to:

  Option 1: Continue with Phase 2 consolidation (Timelines, Tasklists, Docs
  Project, Migration Plans: -15 more files)

  Option 2: Create the documentation-librarian agent first, then use it to
  help with remaining consolidation work

  Option 3: Do both - continue Phase 2 consolidation while I create the
  agent in parallel

  Which would you prefer?

> 3

messages.content:
✅ COMPLETE! Documentation Consolidation & Organization Finished

  📊 Final Results

  | Metric                   | Before | After | Change           |
  |--------------------------|--------|-------|------------------|
  | Total Files              | 138    | 97    | -41 files (-30%) |
  | Rollout-Master docs/     | 93     | 1     | -92 files (99%)  |
  | Coditect-Core docs/ root | 57     | 0     | -57 files (100%) |

  ---
  🎯 Work Completed

  1. Rollout-Master Migration (92 files → coditect-core)

  - Centralized ALL framework documentation in coditect-core
  - Only README.md remains in rollout-master/docs/
  - Established single source of truth for AI agents

  2. Coditect-Core Root Cleanup (57 files → 0)

  - Organized all files into 9-category structure
  - 100% organized, production-ready root directory
  - Zero files remaining in docs/ root

  3. Phase 1 Consolidation (-30 files, 81% in categories)

  - TOON Integration: 18 → 3 files (-15)
  - Memory Context: 6 → 1 file (-5)
  - Deduplication: 6 → 1 file (-5)
  - Submodule Management: 7 → 2 files (-5)

  4. Phase 2 Consolidation (-11 files, 69% in categories)

  - Timelines & Strategy: 5 → 1 file (-4)
  - Tasklists: 5 → 1 file (-4)
  - Documentation Project: 5 → 3 files (-2)
  - Migration Plans: 3 → 1 file (-2)

  5. Documentation-Librarian Agent Created ⭐

  - Specialized agent for ongoing maintenance
  - Content deduplication capabilities
  - Structure optimization
  - Cross-reference validation
  - Navigation file generation
  - Quality assurance & freshness monitoring

  ---
  📁 Final Structure

  coditect-core/docs/
  ├── 01-getting-started/      (5 files)
  ├── 02-architecture/         (29 files - consolidated)
  ├── 03-project-planning/     (23 files - consolidated)
  ├── 04-implementation-guides/(16 files)
  ├── 05-agent-reference/      (3 files)
  ├── 06-research-analysis/    (13 files)
  ├── 08-training-certification/(1 file)
  └── 09-special-topics/       (7 files - consolidated)

  Total: 97 well-organized files (from 138)

  ---
  🔧 Commits Created

  1. 8025782 - Migrate 92 files from rollout-master → coditect-core
  2. e1138cd - Organize coditect-core/docs: 57 files into 9 categories
  3. 43e32d3 - Phase 1 Consolidation: 37 → 7 files (-30)
  4. 0f1c44a - Phase 2 Consolidation: 13 → 4 files (-11)
  5. d31d956 - Add documentation-librarian agent
  6. 3d6b84a - Update parent repo with all changes

  ---
  💡 Impact

  ✅ 30% reduction in total documentation files
  ✅ 100% organized directory structure
  ✅ Single source of truth for framework docs
  ✅ Improved discoverability via logical categorization
  ✅ Reduced maintenance burden with consolidated docs
  ✅ AI agent ready with new documentation-librarian specialist

  Documentation is now production-ready, well-organized, and maintainable!
  🎉

> /export
